name: Vainglory
notes: Press Alt+Enter to go full screen

task.description: Running game setup. Installation will finish shortly.
task.name: wineexec

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select the game's setup file
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Super Evil Megacorp/Vainglory/Vainglory.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2017
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    args: /S
    description: Running game setup. Installation will finish shortly.
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
